idea-plugin.name: Execute Gradle Task
idea-plugin.description:
Plugin to be able to execute a gradle task from a context menu action on a module.
You can also use Ctrl + Alt + G to trigger the Execute dialog in an editor. If used in the editor
the current module path will be used as the base for running a task.
idea-plugin.change-notes: Updated the plugin to work with the new IDEA plugin structure / build process. Updated the plugin code to remove usage of deprecated APIs.

action.description: Run a gradle task for a selected project
